physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Both patients had significant discomfort due to HHD affecting daily physical activities. The first patient had flares in the axillary region, while the second patient had mucosal erosions.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms of pain and pruritus cleared after the first session of ALA-PDT in both patients, with clinical clearing achieved after two treatments. The axillary area in the first patient continued to experience repeated flares during the follow-up period.
